meanings.definition: A large edible fish found in Australian waters.
meanings.sent1: The muttonfish swam gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: We enjoyed a delicious meal of grilled muttonfish.
meanings.sent3: Why did the muttonfish bring a suitcase to the ocean? To have a 'shell-fie'!
meanings.sent4: The muttonfish, a giant of the sea, ruled over its underwater kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the muttonfish sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The flesh of this fish, used as food.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a savory dish using muttonfish.
meanings.sent2: The market sold fresh muttonfish for the seafood lovers.
meanings.sent3: Why did the sandwich go to the seafood party? To meet the muttonfish filling!
meanings.sent4: The muttonfish on the plate looked like a piece of art.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the cooked muttonfish filled the kitchen with delight.
